income_messages:
From: o**********e@yahoo.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-16 10:37:08
SUBJECT: Attn:The Beneficiary,
Attn:The Beneficiary,
Are you alive ? If yes , have you received your overdue payment from
the Benin Republic government ?.
I am asking this question today due to the letter we received from a
one time senator of the federation dated 14/04/23. In his letter , he
said that you are now late and that your funds US$2.5M should be
transferred to one Mrs.Kerry Morton's bank account with First National
Bank in Arkansas, United States of America.
Since I have your email on our system , I decided to send this message
through your email address today hoping to find out if you are dead as
he claimed or still alive. Also to find out if you are at any time
given the Power of Attorney for any one to represent you in claiming
your overdue payment.
Kindly respond to this letter today if you are still alive with your
direct working telephone number to let us know if you are aware of
this plan as claimed by the senator .
Yours sincerely,
Femi John Dan
From: o**********e@yahoo.com
To: ym03970@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-17 08:03:03
SUBJECT: Dear beneficiary
Attn:The Beneficiary,
Sir
We are very happy to hear that you are alive so please sir you have to send to us your full information
Like Your Name
Your country
Your address
Your Telephone
Your age
So if you are still alive you are
advice in your own best interest to reply back immediately with your full details as stated for your funds.
Yours sincerely,
Mr, John Dan
outbound_messages:
From: ym03970@l******s.email
To: o**********e@yahoo.com
Time: 2023-04-16 10:37:13
SUBJECT: Re: Attn:The Beneficiary,
Hello Femi John Dan,
Thank you for reaching out to me. Yes, I am alive and well. However, I have not received any overdue payment from the Benin Republic government. I am not aware of any plan as claimed by the senator, and I have not given anyone the Power of Attorney to represent me in claiming any payment. 
May I ask, how did you obtain my email address? Also, can you provide more information about this payment and the senator's letter? 
Thank you.
Best wishes,
Rocky
From: ym03970@l******s.email
To: o**********e@yahoo.com
Time: 2023-04-17 10:45:22
SUBJECT: Re: Dear beneficiary
Hello Mr. John Dan,
Thank you for your message. I appreciate your concern for my well-being. However, I am not comfortable sharing my personal information with someone I do not know. Can you please provide more details about the funds you mentioned? What is it for and how did I become eligible for it?
Best wishes,
Rocky
